issue.title: [C++] Add an incomplete dictionary type
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5052](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5052). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This would allow to pass a `DataType` that means "dict-encoded data with the given index types and value types, but the actual values are not yet known" (they might be inferred by processing non-dict-encoded data, or they might be transferred explicitly - but later - in the data stream).

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5052?focusedCommentId=16845965) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Closing in favor of solution merged in ARROW-3144
